ENV_MODE.Comments: ENV_MODE can be qa/uat/prod/dev/si/demo, please make sure everything remains in lower case.

ORIGINATOR_CODE.Comments: The value of this can be null if no originator code is present.

API_STRING.Comments: API to get input data, URL_ENV_MODE and API_TEST_MODE will be replaced by their corresponding values.

EXECUTION_MODE.Comments: API_TEST_MODE- If data of the past 'x' days is needed mention this as an integer , else leave it blank.
